import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (

About LivingLink

Transforming residential society management through technology

Our Mission

LivingLink was founded with a simple mission: to make residential society management seamless, transparent, and efficient. We believe that technology should simplify life, not complicate it.

What We Do

We provide a comprehensive platform that connects residents, management committees, maintenance staff, and security personnel. Our system streamlines communication, automates processes, and brings transparency to society operations.

100+
Societies Managed
10,000+
Happy Residents
24/7
Support Available
99.9%
Uptime Guarantee

Our Team

We're a team of passionate developers, designers, and customer support specialists dedicated to making society living better for everyone.

); }; export default About;
